name: Continuous Flyer - A-10 Thunderbolt II 'Warthog'
description:
Latest Test release - 11/14/2021

Available for open testing on Google Play Store or choose the .apk file that fits your phone above

Use the A-10 Thunderbolt II's  A-10's GAU-8/A Avenger cannon to shred enemy armor and instillations. Let's see how long you can last flying the worlds most lethal close air support aircraft through never ending enemy fire.

Report any bugs to : dubyastudios@gmail.com
